family_steps.step_1: Create an instance of `Editor` class with mandatory file path or byte stream and load the {{EXT}} file
family_steps.step_2: Create the `DelimitedTextEditOptions` class instance for the {{EXT}} file format and specify a mandatory string separator in the constructor
family_steps.step_3: Call `Editor.Edit()` method and obtain {{EXT}} document in HTML format that is easily editable with any WYSIWYG-editor.
family_steps.step_4: Call `Editor.Save()` method and save edited {{EXT}} file using the `DelimitedTextSaveOptions` class instance with desired separator
